column5: THOUGHT ID SWITCH IT UP TODAY AND TRY SOMETHIN DIFF. WAS GONNA TRY IT A FEW WEEKS BACK BUT MY FRIEND SAID IT WAS ONLY 3INCHES OF ICE. I KNOW THEY SAY ITS GOOD TO WALK ON BUT AT 260 I DONT TAKE ANY RISKS  LOL A GOOD SOLID 8TO10 INCHES OF GOOD BLACK ICE WE FOUND. LOOKED AT IT YESTERDAY FOR TODAY. GOT THERE TODAY AND SOMETHIN LOOKED ODD OUT ON THE ICE. STARTED SEEIN BLOOD EVERYWHERE AND WAS WONDERING WHAT THE HECK. GOT UP TO A PILE OF FUR AND BONES. PACK OF CYOTES MANAGED TO TACKLE DOWN A DOE. SAW THE TRAIL FROM THE WOODS AND SHE DIDNT HAVE A CHANCE ONCE SHE HIT THE ICE. SAW WHERE SHE SLIPPED AND FELL TWICE AND THEY GET SOME PIECES OF HER. PROB LIKE WEARIN ROLLERSKATES ON ICE WITH HOOVES. ONE NIGHT THEY SURE DIDNT LEAVE MUCH   ON WITH THE FISHIN. SLOW DAY. ONLY MANAGED 2 MALES BUT WAS A BLAST WITH THE SHORT RODS AND 8INCH HOLE.  THE SETUP   MALE 1   MALE 2
they are also geeting them good in the harbour mouth of graham creek in newcstle  just cut a hole were the pool would be and bingo
Great report and pics COPPER Must be a different feeling targeting them chrome with a shorter rod and 8" inch hole Some real beauties right there..... congrats Thanks for sharing Leechman
DAMN Scott!  Now we have to get out ASAP!  Your on fire, or is that another saying on the ice...
TX GUYS. YA LAST THINK YA WANT ON ICE IS FIRE GBW  LOL
And i'm catching perch   !!! Nice, wadja get em on, roe ?
that was a site to see they left no scraps  lost two hammer handle pike at the hole     after you left  seeya around paul
2 hammers eh. would of been nice to see. ya didnt leave much. like a cronzy shorelunch  lol tomors another day  lol
Nice, on the hardwater steel, and, "wild" on the doe's remains.  Really getting the itch to try "bows" through the ice now!!
Cool pics of the Doe CC. Awesome job on the steel.  Great all round report, enjoyed reading that.
Nice...i love steel through the ice...hopefully superior freezes up here so i can get out.  Awsome fish
Save some for your bro out west fella  I arrive on the 9th of Feb in Ottawa, but get ready for the 15th, or 16th early am my brother!!! And many days after!!!  Miss ya big fella, see ya soon!
I LOVE YOUR REPORTS, HOWEVER THESE CAPS MAKE IT SEEM LIKE YOUR YELLING YOUR STORY TO US!

Buster, for you and those who don't know my bro COPPER, he is missin a peeper, the "Caps" is easier for him to type. One eye or 2, my brother still kicks me but at the silvers  Float comes back to Ont in Feb, look out GL"S Bows
